title: Retirement Advisor: Mark Mappa Maintains ‘Cash Flow Is King’
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Mark Mappa of Mappa Wealth Management in Glenview, Ill., is a financial advisor and author of a new book called “Cash Flow is King.” In this podcast (21:00), Mappa makes a forceful distinction between clients with millions of dollars, but not enough to retire, and clients with just hundreds of thousands of dollars who will be quite comfortable. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
